snippet: Josh Powell was under investigation in the disappearance of his wife two years ago in Utah, and authorities said the fatal explosion on Sunday appeared to be intentional.
abstract: Washington State man Josh Powell and his two young sons are killed in what appears to be an intentional home explosion in Graham, Wash; Powell was being investigated for the 2009 disappearance of his wife Susan.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and ISOLDE RAFTERY
byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer reported from New York, and Isolde Raftery from Seattle.

lead_paragraph: Josh Powell was under investigation in the disappearance of his wife two years ago in Utah, and authorities said the fatal explosion on Sunday appeared to be intentional.

headline.seo: Josh Powell, Whose Wife Disappeared, Dies With Sons in Blast
headline.main: Man Whose Wife Disappeared Dies With Sons in Explosion
headline.print_headline: Man Whose Wife Disappeared Dies With Sons in Explosion
